document_data.name: Krystryn's Shelves
document_data.mainbody: '''Krystryn's Shelves''' was the shop, and home, of one of [[Sundabar]]'s master carpenters, [[Krystyn Danard]]. She specialized in crafting shelves, chests and wardrobes with a smooth finish and considered her work an art, demanding complete privacy. Some of her rival wood-workers insisted that [[magic]] played a part in her creations.
